Subseries II.E. Newspaper, Radio, and Television Clippings Files
Subseries II.E. Newspaper, Radio, and Television Clippings Files

The Newspaper, Radio, and Television Clippings Files cover the period of 1989 to 1991 and includes collected newspaper clippings as wells as transcripts of radio and television shows that mention specific issues of Fortune or featured articles. The folder titles appear to relate to specific issues of Fortune rather than the dates of the clippings. of a specific clipping was published.
